name: Chess Opening Repertoire Builder
description:
Chess Opening Repertoire Builder or CORB is a chess app/game extracted from chess career simulation game Master of Chess.


It is designed as a helping tool for expanding, better understanding and training of your chess opening repertoire.

Features

  • Expand your opening repertoire via graph display of opening lines
  • Annotate moves in the graph
  • Search through official openings database
  • Test your knowledge of different openings by solving opening quizes
  • Play Chess Matches from preselected positions
